1-2: report from the correspondent in Tiberias. detailing the budgets of the EC and the individual schools for boys and girls, including salaries, rent etc.
3m: opening of the new tramway line
yesterday the company celebrated the inauguration of the new tramway line to Muhājirīn. attended by the Vali, the commander of the 8th army, and other officials and members of the baladiyya
The people criticise that none of them (al-ahalīn) were invited to the party. they also criticise the alteration of the imperial concessions as the line is not continued to the house of Khūrshīd Bey Wahbī near the house of Nāẓim Pasha. there is also no prohibition on some who had been … during the boycott of the Mīdān, who welcomed the guests as if they were its employees.
probably the company will prolong the line to the site established by imperial irade. otherwise one should always point to the example of the successful boycott of the Mīdān and how the populace (shaʿb) fought for their rights (ḥuqūq).
m: the ministry of finance issued orders to stop paying all salaries. this comes after the treasury stole (saraqat) the salaries of the police and gendarmerie for the month of Nīsān. now the rest of the officials will be in arrears and the Vali and defterdar demand to be the first in this measure m: yest, fire in the store of <persName>ʿAbd al-Ḥamīd Efendi al-Ḥallāq</persName> (barber) in the street of the Ḥammām al-Bāshā. extinguished before it could spread further
al-Muqtabas: Jarīdat Yawmiyya Siyāsiyya Iqtiṣādiyya Ijtimāʿiyya
al-Muqtabas: Jarīdat Yawmiyya Siyāsiyya Iqtiṣādiyya Ijtimāʿiyya
3m: sudden death of <persName>Yūsuf bin ʿAwḍ</persName> from Bāb Tūmā who collapse in the middle of the road and died
al-Muqtabas: Jarīdat Yawmiyya Siyāsiyya Iqtiṣādiyya Ijtimāʿiyya

the pages are full with reports from the capital and the murder of the grand vizier Şevket Paşa
2-3opening of the Syrian Arabic conference / congress
3m: treason in Damascus. some people were arrested
al-Muqtabas: Jarīdat Yawmiyya Siyāsiyya Iqtiṣādiyya Ijtimāʿiyya

2 "to the baladiyya" by "a Damascene" (shāmī); lengthy call on the baladiyya, whose duty it is to repair and clean the streets, and which is paid for these tasks by the people, should actually start sprinkling the roads for the sake of public health (al-ṣaḥḥat al-ʿāmma)
3m: accident in the gardens outside Bāb Sharqī; somebody was accidentally shot.
m: Thu morn [i.e. 19 Jun]; parts of the battalion of redifs from al-Nabk went to the Umayyad Mosque in demand for their release papers they barricaded themselves in the eastern section of the Mosque and pointed their weapons to the gates thus preventing any entry into their refuge. a delegation of the Vali, some military men, the <persName>Shaykh Badr al-Dīn</persName> [the naqīb al-ashrāf] and <persName>Shaykh ʿAbd al-Qādir al-Khaṭīb</persName> convinced them to give up after their demands were granted.
m: fire in a shop in Sūq Midḥat Pasha destroyed some £T300
al-Muqtabas: Jarīdat Yawmiyya Siyāsiyya Iqtiṣādiyya Ijtimāʿiyya

3m: Suriye: the company extended the singly tramway track from Jisr al-Abyaḍ to the quarter of Muhājirīn in Ṣāliḥiyya
During this work, the people walked in onto the company and increased their demands. the compartments are not entirely closed to transport the excursionists … they complain a lot. but closed compartments would slow down the trains, which again would cause complaints….
nevertheless we suggest to offer coaches with 2 or 3 compartments [or do they mean trains of 2-3 cars?] for the peace of mind of the people
al-Muqtabas: Jarīdat Yawmiyya Siyāsiyya Iqtiṣādiyya Ijtimāʿiyya

2m: yest, received a letter from Beirut that one of the editors of al-Mufīd, <persName>Fuʾād Efendi Ḥantas</persName> [?], died aged 34
3m: <persName>Fāris Abū Salīm al-Ṣadfī</persName>, merchant from Damascus, died yesterday, aged 90
iʿlān: throughout 1913, the Zahra Dimashq Theatre runs ads for daily movie screenings
al-Muqtabas: Jarīdat Yawmiyya Siyāsiyya Iqtiṣādiyya Ijtimāʿiyya
al-Muqtabas: Jarīdat Yawmiyya Siyāsiyya Iqtiṣādiyya Ijtimāʿiyya
al-Muqtabas: Jarīdat Yawmiyya Siyāsiyya Iqtiṣādiyya Ijtimāʿiyya

3m: the jamʿiyya al-asʿāf al-khayriyya celebrated the inauguration of its school in the Buzūriyya. attended by the Vali, many merchants, and men of knowledge. they saw the difference between the children attending a school and those living on the streets (yaʿīshūna fī al-aziqqa) etc. NOT READ
m: official announcement by the MoI on the events in Constantinople
al-Muqtabas: Jarīdat Yawmiyya Siyāsiyya Iqtiṣādiyya Ijtimāʿiyya
al-Muqtabas: Jarīdat Yawmiyya Siyāsiyya Iqtiṣādiyya Ijtimāʿiyya

3m: tramway director: we were informed that the general administration of the tramway company in Brussels discharged the director in Damascus, Monsieur Maysūn, and appointed Monsieur Henriyūn, one of the engineers, in his stead. this is due to the protest of the people, and we hope that the new director will answer to the people (al-ahlīn)
m: new tariffs of the Ḥijaz railway between Damascus and Medina
al-Muqtabas: Jarīdat Yawmiyya Siyāsiyya Iqtiṣādiyya Ijtimāʿiyya

3m: violent quarrel (mushājara) in the prison with three injured.
a severe quarrel took place on Thu evening at the prison (dār al-tawfīq) at the citadel between Damascenes and Kurds. two damascenes were wounded <persName>Muḥammad Sawsānī</persName> and <persName>Yaḥyā Maḥfūẓ</persName>; from among the Kurds <persName>Abū Marʿī</persName> was injured. the reason being that a similar fight had occurred on Wed and gendarmes entered the prison on Thu morn to investigate the matter and found a number of weapons among the Damascenes
m: one day of rest per week
on the necessity of one day rest per week for the health and benefit of the worker, which is part of his personal liberty (al-ḥuriyya al-shakhṣiyya)
m: the people of Ṣāliḥiyya criticise the tramway company for not sprinkling the road as required by contract
al-Muqtabas: Jarīdat Yawmiyya Siyāsiyya Iqtiṣādiyya Ijtimāʿiyya

2m: the rights of the Arabs in the Ottoman state
citing the ḥuqūq shaʿb wa ḥaqq umma
al-Muqtabas: Jarīdat Yawmiyya Siyāsiyya Iqtiṣādiyya Ijtimāʿiyya
3m: railway accident: yest a train of the Ḥijāz railway leaving Damascus main station for al-Qaddam killed a six-year old girl on the tracks
al-Muqtabas: Jarīdat Yawmiyya Siyāsiyya Iqtiṣādiyya Ijtimāʿiyya

2m: ʿīd al-dustūr: celebrations were held in accordance with the programme (al-brūghrām) published in earlier numbers. particularly the celebrations of the commander of the troops at the military garden accorded God's benevolence
3iʿlān: extension of a new tramway line from Jisr al-Abyāḍ to al-Shaykh al-Akbār
the tramway and electric lighting company announces that it will prolong the tramway line from Jisr al-Abyaḍ to the tomb of Ibn ʿArabī after 15 days from this announcement. everyone who has relations to real-estate owners along the course should announce them to the baladiyya.
al-Muqtabas: Jarīdat Yawmiyya Siyāsiyya Iqtiṣādiyya Ijtimāʿiyya

3m: speed of the tramway
yesterday the tramway train drove at high speeds along the Jisr al-Abyaḍ section and was to fast to quickly and crashed into a coach full of women. thanks to god nobody was hurt. we hope that such illegal speeds with be henceforth prohibited / prevented
al-Muqtabas: Jarīdat Yawmiyya Siyāsiyya Iqtiṣādiyya Ijtimāʿiyya

al-Muqtabas: Jarīdat Yawmiyya Siyāsiyya Iqtiṣādiyya Ijtimāʿiyya

3m: the imperial government informed the province of Syria about the reform programme for the Arab provinces of the empire
m: yest. returned the Vali of Syria, <persName>ʿĀrif Bey</persName>, and was heartily welcomed (full note)
m: murder of the tramway
m: yesterday, the people of Damascus commence fasting with the arrival of the new moon
yest evening the tramway killed <persName>Ibn al-Bustānī</persName> a boy of 13 years in the Darwīshiyya. his legs had been cut off and he died seven hours later
al-Muqtabas: Jarīdat Yawmiyya Siyāsiyya Iqtiṣādiyya Ijtimāʿiyya
al-Muqtabas: Jarīdat Yawmiyya Siyāsiyya Iqtiṣādiyya Ijtimāʿiyya

2m: volunteers (mutaṭwaʿa) from India in the Society of the Red Crescent
3m: electric light and the Quarter of al-Qanawāt, by M.D.
the light is still cut off from one of the most important quarters of Damascus … this is oppression of the Muslims and the company uses the pretext of its quarrels with one or two persons to punish a whole quarter.
we call on the company to point us to any of the articles of its concession, which provides the legal framework for its criminal action to cut the light off from the populace of the quarter (ʿan ʿāmmat al-maḥalla)
we call on the municipality not to further negotiate with the company but to light the streets with petrol, as it is its duty to supply safety and light
we call on the customers of the company who are supplied with electricity to cancel their subscriptions and engage in a boycott of the company
al-Muqtabas: Jarīdat Yawmiyya Siyāsiyya Iqtiṣādiyya Ijtimāʿiyya

2m: ʿīd al-fiṭr; everything was quiet
m: have private information that the iʿdādī in Damascus (maktab ʿanbar) will be made a Sulṭānī school
3m: the province of Beirut issued orders to import banned newspapers [?!] m: today opened the al-madrasa al-ʿuthmāniyya under the directorship of <persName>Shaykh Kāmil al-Qaṣṣāb</persName>
m: the slaughterhouse in Bāb al-Muṣallā
received critique of the hygienic conditions at the slaughterhouse and the danger to general health (al-ṣaḥḥat al-ʿāmma) from badly cleaned meat. they use dirty water, as the quarter is not supplied with the ʿAyn Fīja water. inspection and supply with clean waters are municipal duties
al-Muqtabas: Jarīdat Yawmiyya Siyāsiyya Iqtiṣādiyya Ijtimāʿiyya

2m: papers in Constantinople report on the ratio of Arabs in the bureaucracy. very low
3m: new monthly journal in Baghdad: lughat al-ʿarab
al-Muqtabas: Jarīdat Yawmiyya Siyāsiyya Iqtiṣādiyya Ijtimāʿiyya

3m: extension of the tramway
Suriye: the tramway company completed the extension from Jisr al-Abyaḍ to the Mosque at the tomb of Muḥī al-Dīn Ibn al-ʿArabī
al-Muqtabas: Jarīdat Yawmiyya Siyāsiyya Iqtiṣādiyya Ijtimāʿiyya

1al-nahḍa al-ʿarabiyya
1-2budget of the Ottoman Empire
2lethal tramway accident in Beirut
3m: yest 11:30 a.m. a fire broke out in the store of <persName>Badr al-Dīn Efendi al-Ḥallāq</persName> and <persName>Musallam Efendi al-Kuzbirī</persName> in the Khān Jaqmaq. the store was destroyed but the flames did not spread further.
al-Muqtabas: Jarīdat Yawmiyya Siyāsiyya Iqtiṣādiyya Ijtimāʿiyya

3m: the wage for calligraphy teachers at the civil iʿdādī in Damascus is Ps 200
iʿlān for movie screening at the Zahra Dimashq theatre; daily
al-Muqtabas: Jarīdat Yawmiyya Siyāsiyya Iqtiṣādiyya Ijtimāʿiyya

2m: the national theatres
m: Syria and Palestine
3m: workers of the electric lighting company asked for entry at the house of <persName>Badriyya Bint Aḥmad al-Shaykh</persName> of the inhabitants of Qaṣr al-Ḥujāj for some necessary inspection. she denied entry as her husband was not at home and they entered nevertheless
al-Muqtabas: Jarīdat Yawmiyya Siyāsiyya Iqtiṣādiyya Ijtimāʿiyya
3m: sultan's birthday: today the Calif of the Muslims and Sultan of the Ottomans celebrates his birthday.
al-Muqtabas: Jarīdat Yawmiyya Siyāsiyya Iqtiṣādiyya Ijtimāʿiyya

2m: Arabic language as official language at courts and the judiciary
3m: we reported that the Sultan's birthday was to be yesterday, but it is today; the serai, military headquarters, municipality, and other houses are adorned on the occasion.
official celebrations will be held this morning at the baladiyya and the military headquarters
m: Muslim women and veiling (tasattur)
the baladiyya asked for a decision of the provincial administration council on the issue of allowing clubs for Muslim women and for the opinion as to its conformity with the sharʿiyya.
m: the baladiyya and charcoal
on an administration that pledged some 25.000 qinṭār of charcoal
m: a four year old girl died

2m: 8 o'clock on Wed commences the trial of the publisher of al-Muqtabas <persName>Muḥammad Kurd ʿAlī</persName> at the 1st penal court of Damascus. he is defended by <persName>ʿAbd al-Wahhāb Bey al-Inklīzī</persName>, <persName>Shukrī Efendi al-Jundī</persName>, <persName>Fāʾiq Bey al-Ghaṣīn</persName>, <persName>Amīr ʿĀrif al-Shahābī</persName>, and the editor of this newspaper [Aḥmad Kurd ʿAlī]
m: articles on electric lighting in Damascus
Suriye published a mazbata from the general section of the State Council which … the contract between the municipality of Damascus and tramway and electric lighting company. [two lines are covered with tape and not legible]
the contract does not approve the legal complaint as a stop in lighting the lamps (shaʿl al-maṣābīḥ wa iṭifāʾuhā) needed to have been agreed upon beforehand by the baladiyya and the company according to art 14 of the statutes . the ministry of public works investigated whether art 2 allowed for such a cut-off and equally rejected the idea. Only art 5 and 6 might grand such a right when the concession was appended to also cover the area outside the original baladiyya, that is Ṣāliḥiyya. the baladiyya pledged to expand the area of validity for the concession but this has not happened. thus it is legal (qānūnan) as if it was never done (kaʾannahu lam yakun)
3m: first announcement for Muḥammad Kurd ʿAlī's "Khiṭaṭ al-Shām"
al-Qabas: Jarīdat Yawmiyya Siyāsiyya Iqtiṣādiyya Ijtimāʿiyya

3m: those run over by the tramway (madhūs al-trām)
<persName>Ṣubḥī bin Ṣāliḥ Sāyima</persName> had been riding a donkey in front of the tramway train on Ṣāliḥiyya road when he fell under it. his hand was severed in consequence and he lost a lot of blood
m: <persName>Ḥasan bin Ḥasan al-ʿĀmm</persName> an eight year old boy died when the roof his was standing on in the house of his father collapsed under him
m: to the baladiyya
we ask the municipality to send its henchmen to the arriving trains to put the sequence of trains into order until they ease traffic for those driving. we also ask them to cover the river Qanawāt in front of the station to broaden the road to ease traffic there
al-Qabas: Jarīdat Yawmiyya Siyāsiyya Iqtiṣādiyya Ijtimāʿiyya

2Ottoman budget for the current year
m: report on the trial of Muḥammad Kurd ʿAlī
al-Qabas: Jarīdat Yawmiyya Siyāsiyya Iqtiṣādiyya Ijtimāʿiyya
al-Qabas: Jarīdat Yawmiyya Siyāsiyya Iqtiṣādiyya Ijtimāʿiyya

3m: sentence in the trial of Muḥammad Kurd ʿAlī
m: some merchants criticise the director of the post
m: the baladiyya turned its attention to the square in front of its building, which is covered with water and mud and emits awful smells. as a reform-oriented administration it should not rest before it cleared up this mess.
al-Qabas: Jarīdat Yawmiyya Siyāsiyya Iqtiṣādiyya Ijtimāʿiyya
gratitude to the doctor: Dr. Tawfīq Farmīn Malikiyān Efendi who arrived 40 days ago
al-Qabas: Jarīdat Yawmiyya Siyāsiyya Iqtiṣādiyya Ijtimāʿiyya

3m: broadening of a road: yesterday <persName>Sulaymān Shafīq Pasha</persName>, commander of the 8th army announced the broadening of the street leading from the Ḥijāz railway station to the headquarters of the 8th Army (i.e. the later Boulevard Cemal Pasha / Naṣr Street). the barracks on its southern side will be demolished and the street will become one of the broadest in Damascus.
he also supports the broadening of the road connecting the Ḥijāz railway station with the iron bridge (Jisr Victoria it would be). this is another project, which will enshrine him in the hearts of the Damascenes
we call on the baladiyya to give these two streets important and noble names
m: the new Qādī / Nāʾib al-Sharʿa, <persName>Khūrshīd Efendi</persName> arrived in Damascus will take up his new duty on 1 Muḥ
m: <persName>Hāshim Bey</persName>, the new director of education arrived
al-Qabas: Jarīdat Yawmiyya Siyāsiyya Iqtiṣādiyya Ijtimāʿiyya

2prices of foodstuffs in Zahle, Baalbek and Muʿallaqa
3m: the Vali of Beirut, <persName>Bakr Sāmī Bey</persName>, arrived in Damascus and was welcomed by Sulaymān Shafīq Pasha, the locum tenens of the Vali and commander of the 8th army, and military officers. he stays at the Grand Hotel Victoria (funduq)
al-Qabas: Jarīdat Yawmiyya Siyāsiyya Iqtiṣādiyya Ijtimāʿiyya
2m: something on the municipality and the merchants of the Sūq al-Ḥamīdiyya [copy is very blurred]
al-Qabas: Jarīdat Yawmiyya Siyāsiyya Iqtiṣādiyya Ijtimāʿiyya

2m: the baladiyya established prices of bread and meat (and charcoal and firewood) and defined punishments for offenders. these are necessities and punishments defined in art 160 of the penal code. 3 days to a week imprisonment and a monetary penalty of 15 to 20 beshlik
3iʿlān: throughout these numbers there are wonderful art deco ads by Nestlé
4iʿlān by the Qahwat al-Quwatlī run by <persName>Salīm Āğā al-Aghwānī</persName>
al-Qabas: Jarīdat Yawmiyya Siyāsiyya Iqtiṣādiyya Ijtimāʿiyya
